LanguageData.RB_InsertBeesDesc: Insert a drone in this beehouse
LanguageData.RB_InsertQueensDesc: Insert a queen bee in this beehouse
LanguageData.RB_BeehouseCombNoProgressPlants: Stopped due to absence of plant or resource in 6 tiles radius
LanguageData.GU_PlaceNextToBeeHouse: The brood chamber needs to be placed adjacent to a beehouse
LanguageData.GU_NoAdjacentBeehouse: Warning: this brood chamber has no adjacent beehouse
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseInactive: Adjacent beehouse is inactive right now
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseRunning: The brood chamber is attached to a beehouse, and will occasionally produce drones and queens of one of the bee species present on it
LanguageData.GU_PlaceNextToBeeHouseLeft: The hybridization chamber needs to be placed adjacent to a beehouse
LanguageData.GU_NoAdjacentBeehouseHybridization: Warning: this hybridization chamber has no adjacent beehouse
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseInactive: Adjacent beehouse is inactive right now
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseRunningHybridization: Hybridization chamber attached to a beehouse. It will occasionally produce mutant queens if possible. To create drones, insert the queen in the beehouse and attach a Brood Chamber
LanguageData.GU_HybridMutationsRunning: Mutations are random, happening between 1 to 3 days (currently running)
LanguageData.GU_HybridMutationsStopped: Mutations are random, happening between 1 to 3 days (currently stopped)
LanguageData.RB_Hybrid: A new mutant bee has been created in a hybridization chamber!
LanguageData.RB_FiveHybrids: A new mutant bee has been created in a hybridization chamber! This combination produces other 4 possible mutations.
LanguageData.RB_NoHybrid: This combination of bees produces no mutations. You should consider changing them or removing the hybridization chamber!
